{{exclusive|java}}
A [[Banner pattern]] is a shape that can be added to a banner. 

== Definition ==

Banner patterns can be defined in [[data pack]]s, as part of the directory structure below.

{{Data pack directory|banner_pattern|<nowiki><name>.json</nowiki>}}

== JSON Format ==
Banner patterns are defined using the following format:
<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
<section begin="json format" />
** {{nbt|string|asset_id}}: The [[resource location]] for the texture asset.
** {{nbt|string|translation_key}}: The translation key for displaying the banner tooltip.
<section end="json format" />
</div>
